name: Eagle Eye (vnotgames)
description:
Eagle's Eye is a meditative simulation game taking place in the point of view of an eagle soaring over a city. (Also I forgot that HDRP isn't supported in WebGL, so this week's game you have to download! Sorry for any complications that may create.)

Use WASD to move the eagle

And hold LEFT SHIFT to move faster

Sounds not owned by me!
